item.title: In The Bag #4 - Week 47
item.description: Welcome to the fourth edition of In The Bag! [caption id=“attachment_4314” align=“aligncenter” width=“620”] Photo by Sonny Abesamis[/caption] In The Bag #4 - Week 47 Technology Capacity Expansion & Disk Group Design Decisions–All Flash vSAN Every design decision has a consequence, and thats also the case when it comes to vSAN. Jason Langer has written a great article highlighting how enabling deduplication and compression has consequences for drive failure scenarios.
